---
title: "We welcome 5 new individual members"
date: 2018-08-17
subtitle: "The Open Science Center counts 37 member! We want to introduce our latest members."
---


<p>The number of individual members of the OSC is continuously increasing since its foundation in November 2017 with 17 founding members. With our 5 new members from the University Hospital Munich, the OSC counts 37 members from 11 disciplines.</p>
<p><span style="text-decoration: underline;">We are happy to introduce our new members, in alphabetical order:</span></p>
